testing_steps: 1. Start backend: cd backend && python app.py
2. Start frontend: cd frontend && npm start
4. Verify IP-checker demo is removed from Home page
5. Test IP Info tool: Enter 8.8.8.8, verify normalized fields (ip, org, city, country, normalized)
6. Test WHOIS tool: Enter example.com, verify normalized fields (domain, registrar, creation_date, nameservers, normalized)
7. Test SSL tool: Enter google.com, verify normalized fields (domain, valid, issuer, days_remaining, normalized)
8. Test Subdomain tool: Enter example.com, verify validated subdomains and deduplication
9. Test Password Checker: Generate password and passphrase, verify enhanced suggestions
10. Test caching: Run same query twice, verify second call is instant (check console for cache hits)
11. Test enrichment: Check browser console for enrichment API calls (may return 404 if cache empty)
12. Test save report: Run any tool, click 'Save Report', verify toast and console log
13. Run smoke test: cd tests && python tool_smoke_test.py
warnings: Enrichment endpoints return 404 if cache files are empty (expected behavior)
SSL checker requires 'cryptography' package for full SAN extraction (optional, falls back gracefully)
CVE cache file (cve_snippets.json) contains example data only; populate with real CVE data for production
Password checker does NOT send passwords to backend (all processing is client-side only)
Some tools use ToolTemplate component which may need normalization updates separately
